src_original: santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmāḥ pratyupasthiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti / [170/05]
tadyathā manuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ /  te punaścatvāro devanikāyāḥ / [170/06]
santi sattvā nirmitakāmā nirmāya kāmānaiśvarya vaśe vartayanti / [170/06-170/07]
santi sattvāḥ paranirmitakāmāḥ paranirmiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvarya vaśe varttayanti / [170/08]
